senses.definition: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life

examples.text: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
examples.translation: 房子很漂亮﹐我们住在这里非常开心。

examples.text: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
examples.translation: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

examples.text: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
examples.translation: 他是一个快乐的孩子﹐很少哭鼻子。

senses.definition: a happy time, relationship, event etc is a good one that makes you feel happy

examples.text: This has been the happiest day of my life.
examples.translation: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

examples.text: They had a very happy marriage.
I have lots of happy memories of the place.
examples.translation: 我对那地方有着许多美好的回忆。

examples.text: On the whole, I’m happy with the way I look.
examples.translation: 总体来说﹐我对自己的外貌比较满意。

examples.text: People living nearby are not happy with the decision.
examples.translation: 附近的居民对这一决定感到不满。

examples.text: Mum wasn’t happy about Tess going off travelling on her own.
examples.translation: 妈妈不放心特丝单独外出旅行。

senses.definition: to be very willing to do something, especially to help someone
senses.definition_cn: 乐意做某事〔尤指帮助别人〕

examples.text: Our team will be happy to help.
examples.translation: 我们的团队很乐意帮忙。

examples.text: I’d be happy to take you in my car.

senses.definition: used to wish someone happiness on a special occasion
senses.definition_cn: 生日/新年/圣诞节等快乐

examples.text: Happy Birthday, Michael!
Happy Thanksgiving, everyone!

senses.definition: used to wish someone happiness on their birthday

examples.text: By a happy coincidence, James was also in town that weekend.
examples.translation: 巧得很﹐詹姆斯那个周末也在城里。

examples.text: I’m in the happy position of not having to work.

senses.definition: a way of doing something that is not extreme but is somewhere between two possible choices
senses.definition_cn: 〔两件事之间〕皆大欢喜的折中办法

examples.text: I always tried to strike a happy medium between having a home that looked like a bomb had hit it and becoming obsessively tidy.
examples.translation: 我一直想找个满意的折中办法﹐使家里既不会像被炸过那样乱﹐也不会像有洁癖似的过分齐整。

examples.text: His choice of words was not a very happy one.

senses.definition: if you are in or go to your happy place, you imagine you are in a place that makes you feel calm and happy, because it helps you stop thinking about a bad situation
senses.definition_cn: 一个/你的快乐之乡〔指通过美好的想象来摆脱烦恼等的思想境界〕

examples: It was the day before the vacation and everyone was in a good mood.那天是假期的前一天﹐大家心情都不错。

entries.definition: very happy because something good has happened〔因有好事发生而〕非常高兴的
examples: The doctors say they are delighted with her progress.医生们表示对她的进步很满意。

entries.definition: very happy and excited about something非常兴奋的﹔极为激动的
examples: He’s thrilled at the idea of going to Disneyworld.想到要去迪士尼世界﹐他非常兴奋。

entries.definition: very happy because you have heard some good news〔听说好消息后〕极为高兴的
examples: She was overjoyed when she found out that her son was safe.得知儿子平安无事﹐她欣喜若狂。

entries.word: be on top of the world
entries.definition: to be very happy非常高兴
examples: I was over the moon when I won the championship.我得了冠军﹐乐不可支。

examples: The crowd were ecstatic, and cheered wildly.观众欣喜若狂﹐欢声雷动。
